author: parithosh
content:
@clientdevs, Dencun devnet 10 has been stable the last day. We've been feeding it a stable number of blobs, targeting ~3 and not overloading the mempool. Considering this is the best case scenario for a network, find our detailed analysis of it here:
https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/dencun-devnet-10-analysis

author: parithosh
content:
^ There's sections on resource usage, links to dashboards and blob/block/attestation timing analysis. Have a look and let us know if you have questions and if you want us to gather any more data. 

Considering the network is stable, we'll start spamming it, adding blobber and a few more chaotic things to collect more data on the worst case network behaviour.

author: tersec
content: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/dencun-devnet-10-analysis#Blob-performance-per-client-pair still basically function of EL rather than CL

author: pawandhananjay
content: setting up a local node that's all ðŸ˜…

author: pawandhananjay
content:
<@199561711278227457> didn't really get https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/dencun-devnet-10-analysis#BlockBlob-analysis
what does "time from the first blob included in a block" mean?!

author: parithosh
content:
once we get the first blob expected for a block, we start a timer till the last one. once we get the last blob, we should have everything needed to verify the block, otherwise we're missing data for verification.
cc <@181594452228308992>

author: pawandhananjay
content: ahh okay gotcha. So for num_blobs = 0/1, the time would be 0 right?

author: pawandhananjay
content: also, how are you getting the blob arrival metrics on the sentry?

author: pawandhananjay
content: is it the sse event?

author: parithosh
content: Yup

author: parithosh
content: yeah its an sse event

author: parithosh
content: that's why we dont have all clients on there yet. lodestar added support yesterday and we haven't rolled it out yet.

author: parithosh
content: ^ https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/350

author: parithosh
content: can i spam more blobs now?

content: are you also doing the sending duplicate blob sidecars test? if so, could you give us a bit to add some logging for that?

author: parithosh
content: yeah that'll happen via blobber, having some issues initializing it but will ask before i spin it up

author: pawandhananjay
content: sounds good then, will ping once we merge the additional logging in lighthouse
